body: Hi Devong, Want to report an issue with the title of the LB_windRose. When you give a centerPoint the title is rendered far away from the rose. See image: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vwzIt05Fr10GyBRPo4agbwGx*NOlJ9IKyo127nd4hJXiUxycox2aJsbfwayCxlVno4AiBn80vSg2Bn1TYsFSnwkTC-Fona1B/Capture.JPG) Thanks, -A.
